product_name: The North Face Himalayan Down Pants - Men's
long_description: On high-altitude expeditions to the world's coldest environments, you need the ultimate in warmth and protection. The North Face Himalayan down pants deliver the innovation and technology you need.
short_description: On high-altitude expeditions to the world's coldest environments, you need the ultimate in warmth and protection. The North Face Himalayan down pants deliver the innovation and technology you need.
